name: Truck Driver - Truck Games
description:
Like free truck games or see yourself as a trucker or truckie?

Truck Driver Simulator Big Rig allows you to take your big rig truck across an endless wintery landscape.

This 3D truck driving game allows you to drive the truck through the day and night before you run out of gas. Watch the sun set on the horizon as you power your lorry along the long and winding road

Truck Driver Simulator Big Rig has:
* cab view camera 
* touch screen steering
 * traffic lorry and buses to avoid 
* realistic physics  

Get this truck driving simulation now. Hit the gas and put the truck on the road!
